title: Cloud Technical Solutions Engineer, Infrastructure, GKE (English)
location: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India; Pune, Maharashtra, India
description: The Google Cloud team helps companies, schools, and government seamlessly make the switch to Google products and supports them along the way. Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry.
key_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience in reading/debugging code written in a general purpose coding language. Experience troubleshooting and advocating for customer needs. Ability to communicate in English fluently.
preferred_qualifications: 2 years of experience in technical consulting on supporting large enterprise customers. 2 years of experience with Web Tech, Systems Administration, Devops, Networking, Kubernetes. Experience with cloud computing and debugging complex workload issues. Experience working in public cloud services and infrastructure. Experience in Computer Networking.
responsibilities: Work with customers on their production Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE)/Anthos deployments. Develop an understanding of Google Cloud's GKE/Anthos product technology. Act as consultant and subject matter expert for internal stakeholders. Ensure 24-hour customer support. Advocate for customer needs with internal teams to improve the product.
